thread.section_title: Triple Crown Products Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Triple Crown Products | triplecrownproducts.com
thread.title: Richard Nelson
thread.title_full: Triple Crown Products reviewed by Richard Nelson

author: Richard Nelson
title: Richard Nelson
text: Shortly after placing my order I was contacted & informed there was a back log & was asked if I still wanted my order? The delay was not long & for the price it was well worth the small delay. I am very pleased with there customer service & price of my purchase. "I will shop here again "
